# rect

**Instance Property**

The rectangle that encloses the text selection rectangle’s text range.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var rect: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The returned rectangle is in the coordinate system of the text input view that created the receiver.
title: rect
